snippet: The United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit rejected an appeal from a death row inmate whose supporters say was sentenced unfairly because he is black.
abstract: United States Court of Appeals in Texas rejects appeal from death row inmate Duane Buck.
lead_paragraph: The United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit rejected an appeal from a death row inmate whose supporters say was sentenced unfairly because he is black.

headline.main: Texas: Death Row Inmate’s Appeal Refused
headline.print_headline: Texas: Death Row Inmate’s Appeal Refused
